Scattershot/Dark One/Breakdown:


Scattershot and Breakdown stopped, as did Dark One in front of them.  

"Dump the body in the lab, after you cut the head off.  We want NO surprises. 
 I will stand guard here, until you two come to relieve me.  Then I will get 
repaired, take Breakdown's place, then Breakdown will take Scattershot's 
place, then we will repair the damage."

"Yes, mon capiton!" Scattershot saluted, Breakdown nodding, both heading for 
the lab of the Alliance base.  Still dragging Stalker's mech-fluid leaking 
body on the ground.
